PageInfo.Message:
In the <COL ffdc78> "Limit Breaking Arms" </COL>
at the Custom-Made Workshop, you can perform it as
many times as you want by obtaining the following
two things:
① Weapons and armor enhanced up to ★4
② Required costs such as materials and Rift
Crystals
Also, the <COL ffdc78>granted abilities are
overwritten every time you attempt the Limit
Break</COL>, so let's proceed while confirming
examples of granted abilities upon success.
